text: Back when I was a kid I would always ask my dad to play and I would watch him play this game. When he would make it to the final boss (whom everyone knows by now surely) I would be too scared to stay in the room. I miss the good ol days where games weren't just about graphics. Also I never really cared for the music back then just how fun the game was. Now I enjoy the music and never really noticed how underrated this one is.
